title: These are cute but not easy to make
text:
They don't hold together well. We ended up taping the body together instead of holding for the glue to dry. I had to do the majority of the work. The book is cute and the paw patrol critters are cute. Not a lot of playing fun, but he enjoyed the crafting or should I say he enjoyed watching me craft them while pointing to which face went to which character.

They are cute, but not sturdy after being made. Not a good value, but cute fun for your Paw Patrol fan.

title: This is fun, but the sound quality isn't the best.
text: This is just a toy, the sound quality isn't the best, but the toy is fun.  It makes fund sounds and also records and plays back.  It's very entertaining even for some adults. :)

title: This is a fun toy and sturdy
text: This set of toys is great!  Babies- toddlers love this toy.  Even children a little older love having their own cell phone and set of keys.  Batteries last for a long time and toys are easy to wipe clean. Durable.

title: Nice jeep! Charges pretty quickly, runs long enough for lots of fun
text: This jeep is so cute.  It was easy to assemble. Charged it overnight and took off for lots of fun.  I didn't time it but it ran long enough to have a lot of fun.  I would buy again!

title: This is just ok
text: Not much fun.  Can easily use stickers on other balloons and have the same amount of fun. I wouldn't buy again.

title: This bag is well made
text: Hallmark bags are always great quality and I love the pocket for the card.  The colors are bright and the bag is sturdy. I think the price is kind of high, but it is a name brand on it and from a movie.  You won't be disappointed in the quality.

title: This is cute, but smaller than expected since it says up to 7 years old
text: This is cute.  The dog has a pocket on it's back to hold the markers, it's soft and cuddly.  The plastic tray isn't very thick. I think not being too thick makes it a little safer in a vehicle.  I don't think it's a good value.  $22 for a stuffed animal with a pocket, a small tray and markers is kind of steep.  It the animal was also a backpack, it would be a better bang for your buck.  It does what it's described to do.

title: This is the cutest little gardening set!
text: He wil be helping me garden this spring.  He is going to love this set.  It has everything he needs to garden like MiMi.  It is well made and should last a long time. I can't wait for him to come play in the garden with me.

title: This is a fun, sturdy set for digging at the beach or in the garden
text: Children love being outside and seeing their work come to life brings them joy.  We use this little set in the garden and he loves it. We can haul the dirt from one place to another with these perfectly sized tools.  Well made, you wont' be disappointed.

title: This would be great with better instructions
text: This could use better instructions.  Everything was included and helpful, but it really needs the instructions. I'm sure we would have gotten a lot more use out of it.

title: This a fun first time gardening kit.
text:
This kit comes with everything you need including the dirt. It comes with 3 thick plastic pots, 3 dirt pods, seeds and instructions. All you need it the child!

A fun gardening tool set would be a great addition to this kit and would make a perfect spring or fall gift.

title: I love these.  They really help show time in fragments
text: These are a great learning too in teaching children  or anyone about time and how it works.  The pieces are durable and go together well.  The colors are great. I recommend these time rods.

title: This is a fun toy.  Fairly easy to assembly
text: I did have to follow instructions to put this together.  Maybe, kids wouldn't need the instructions. haha!  I think the price is $68 is way too high for this.  I wouldn't pay more than $30 for it.  My g'son loves it!  He loves using Chase to save Hootie's downed tree.  It keeps him entertained for about 15-20 minutes, then he's done until later.

title: This is a cute and fun toy
text: The reason for 4 stars is that it is not a sturdy toy.  It's kind of on the cheaper size. The price is definitely too high for the type of truck. The dinosaurs are cute and the truck is fun.  It's just not a long term toy.

title: Love this lego set
text: The 10 year old got so excited when he saw this set.  He quickly opened it and started putting it together.  He was so proud when he finished it. I think the price is a little high, but the toy itself is great!

title: This is a cute lego set for your minecraft fan
text: This is a cute lego set for your minecraft fan.  The 10 year old loves building this skeleton lego set.  I say it's not giftable because the lego box arrived damaged.  It had been smashed.  It needs to be packaged better for shipping.  The toy was lots of fun for our minecraft fan. Reasonably priced.

title: This is a fun swing saucer.
text: It was easy to assemble and comfortable due to the cushions around the pipes.  It does have exposed areas where the ropes tie on, just have to be a little careful there.  One of the screws fell out of the pipe and now the pipe slips out of place.  I will have to find a replacement screw for it.  The kids really enjoy it as well as some of the adults.

title: Legos are great and this 3 in 1 is wonderful
text:
I love that you can do 3 different thing with this set. It adds to the thought process. The instructions are always clear with lego products. Lots of fun for your builders.

All pieces were included in the box as well as instructions.

title: Scissors are sharp and easy to hold
text:
These scissors are sharp and easy to hold. They work well and I love the color.

I recommend these scissors

title: Fun and helps with creativity.
text:
This is a fun play dough set. 4 stars because it's not a good value. Approximately $25 makes this not worth it. My estimated value of this toy is approximately $15, no more than $20.

It is fun and durable. Entertaining for the little ones. Be prepared to buy or make more dough because it's more fun with more colors.

title: Not a good value.
text: This will definitely use up your kids time while building if need something to keep them busy.  The problem with that is they'll be constantly asking for help.  I don't think it's a good value, nor a very good product.  Too much work for a cheaply made toy. Try again. Get a marshmallow shooter instead.

title: Sharp
text: These scissors are comfortable to hold and cut well.  I used it to cut open my amazon packages.  They work great and look nice.

title: So much fun!
text: My adult child loves to do the excavations just for the fun of it.  The dinosaur is cute and finding the pieces are a lot of fun.  Do this with your child, they will love it if they love dinosaurs!

title: These is a cute play set.
text: This seems durable and will last a long time.  I don't think it's a good value, but I know we are paying for the name, not so much the toy.  I would price this toy at about $10 if it didn't have the Thomas name on it.

title: This is a very cute bank
text:
The Workin' Buddies Mr. Banks, Toy Vehicle makes cool sounds to encourage children to save money. It acts as described.
As a bank, sitting on a shelf, it's fun and exciting. As a toy, it's not the quality of a little tikes or Tonka truck, but it would still be fun indoor play. The $40 is for the electronic part of the truck. It keeps track of the money you put in and take out. It can be played with and will last with light play.

title: Ok games
text: The controllers are very small. Ok, for small kids.  The graphics aren't very good. It's just like it was for the older games.

title: Sturdy and colorful
text:
These are cute books. They are sturdy and very colorful. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because they aren't as thick as most cardboard books.

I love the little set and he loves the big boy "set" of books.

title: Cute, fun doll for water play!
text:
This doll is great! It goes well into the water and doesn't take long to dry. The hoodie towel is absolutely adorable! The colors are bright and is made like hooded baby towels,which adds to the fun!

I'm not a fan of the scent, but it'll wear off soon enough.

title: HUGE hit!  My grandson loves it!
text: This toy is a HUGE hit!  My 2 year old grandson has loved tools since he could crawl.  This set is very nice because the tools actually work with the rest of the toy.  The only thing I would improve upon is the drawer being deeper to hold the screwdriver and hammer.  It does have slots to put the tools in but a thicker drawer with a latch would make it portable and self contained.

title: Well made cars.
text: These are well made.  They even feel high quality.  They are so cute and match the cartoon perfectly.  The paint jobs are great, they roll smoothly.  They would make a great gift.

title: Cute toy, bad package
text: The toys are super cute, but the package they came in was terribly damaged.  These couldn't give it as a gift because it was opened in some areas and appeared the toys had been removed and replaced. No way this could be given in this condition.  They toys are cute, and work as described.  Just don't expect an item in condition for gift giving.

title: Fun to design Barbie's clothes!
text:
Very cute little toy. It's great to "design" your own style for Barbie. The markers weren't dried up. We will wash the dress and see if the marker comes off, so we can make a new design.

Barbie is great as always.

title: eh...not much to it.
text:
Didn't come with much. You don't get much bang for your buck. Nice idea, just not enough material to make it worth buying.

Kids can dig in the junk drawer and come up with some really fun ideas. I wouldn't buy.

title: Great learning toy and fun!  Well made!
text: This is a great learning toy, right along with fun!  It has all colors of the spectrum even light and dark variations, along with turquoise. Easy to pull apart and put back together. Great for matching numbers with quantities and can touch each dot to count so good for one-to-one correspondence. Added bonus: they fit well in the container no matter which way they are placed!  I love toys that fit back into the container easily!

title: These are very nice swings. Perfect for little people
text: These are very nice swings. Perfect for little people.  I would suggest a size up for older kids.  Yes, my 16 year old still loves to swing.  These are ok for her, but we have the bigger swings for her.  Recommended swings.

title: Fun car. Easy to assemble
text: Fun car.  Easy to assemble.  You must apply decals yourself which takes time to get it right.  Of course, if you don't want the cars theme, you can leave it red without decals.  It looks cuter with the decals.  I love that it goes up to age 7.

title: This is a fun little quilt to make
text: This is a fun little quilt to make.  It is just thin pieces of flannel type fabric.  Although it's fun and cute, the price is way to high. I would value this at no more than $20. The colors are bright and fun.

title: I love these swings
text: I love these swings. I go this one free from vine, but I have ordered some before.  They look great on our swing set and are comfortable to swing with.  The appear to be very durable and should last for years!

title: All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards ...
text:
All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards are made of high quality material that will last for a long time.

The colors are bright and captures the students attention.

There is a code card with codes to let you know what language the words are written in on the back of the cards. I feel they could have eliminated the code card and just wrote next to the word, which language it is in instead of needing to reference the code card.

title: All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards ...
text:
All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards are made of high quality material that will last for a long time.

The colors are bright and captures the students attention.

title: All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards ...
text:
All of the Stages Learning Materials language builder flash cards are made of high quality material that will last for a long time.

The colors are bright and captures the students attention.

There is a code card with codes to let you know what language the words are written in on the back of the cards. I feel they could have eliminated the code card and just wrote next to the word, which language it is in instead of needing to reference the code card.

title: I love this soft baby Stella
text:
I love this soft baby Stella! She's great for a first baby doll. I love that her pacifier is a magnet that attaches to
Stella's mouth. She is cute and soft all over. Love her little accessories, too!

title: this is a great little toy for our grandson
text: this is a great little toy for our grandson.  He loves tools and taking things apart to figure them out.  Appears to be well made and the colors are fun.  He loves cranes, too!

title: This is a fun toy. Cutting through the fruit and veggies like ...
text: This is a fun toy.  Cutting through the fruit and veggies like mommy does is such fun and seems to bring a feeling of accomplishment.  I recommend these fruit and vegetable toys and knife.

title: These are so cute and I love the little toys inside
text: These are so cute and I love the little toys inside.  The only issue I have with them is the letters are some do not show up.  They should have used different colors for the letters.  Other than that, a fun toy to take apart and discover something inside.

title: This toy is brightly colored and fun. He loves trying to put in the pieces ...
text: This toy is brightly colored and fun.  He loves trying to put in the pieces and succeeds at some already!  the only thing I would do to improve this toy is to make the top snap on and a bit harder for baby to open it.  He would have to put the blocks in before getting them out, which would encourage him to learn more.

title: This is a nice toy. It has a lot of pieces
text:
This is a nice toy. It has a lot of pieces. Great for an adventurer who like to take things apart and put back together.

I think it's a little much for younger kids and then too babyish for older ones.
All in all its a fun train to pull around for the little ones

title: This is such a very nice playset. The barbie is nice and well made
text: This is such a very nice playset.  The barbie is nice and well made.  The dolphin is adorable and well loved.  The snorkeling supplies are so cute.  The favorite of all is the little dog!

title: I love that it promotes healthy snacks
text: He loves these.  As of now, he just likes to line them up, but he enjoys playing with them.  I love that it promotes healthy snacks

title: This set is great! The dolls are a very nice quality and ...
text: This set is great!  The dolls are a very nice quality and the features are realistic in appearance.  The display is awesome and will be loved by collectors.  The reason for 4 stars is the 2 dolls are in 2 boxes, an inner box which they are displayed together and an outer box, which the display box is in, which I would think is also part of the collectible part for collectors.  The outer box was torn, not the shipping box, but the outer box to the display box.  It's a minor thing for a toy, but not for a collector.

title: Fun and simple enough for 7 year olds, with the help of an adult or responsible teen
text: These are a lot of fun.  I did them with some 7 year old triplets and they loved them!  The reason for only 4 starts is they only give one mold to shape the heart and when doing crafts, even with just mom and daughter, you need at least 2. All in all, it was a lot of fun and the girls loved the treasure they made.

title: Great toy!
text: Great toy.  I love that it's BPA free.  I try to avoid BPA as much as possible.  Since little ones tend to play with toys then put their hands/fingers in their mouth, I feel better that it doesn't include the toxic products in it.  The toy rolls well and the ramps are fun.  The back door clicks closed.  If you don't click it,the little car will fall out when the ramp falls.

title: Fun wagon for a toddler!
text: This is a great toy. Just the right size for a 1 year old.  The rope is short for safety, but long enough for a toddler to pull his favorite toys.

title: Love the flash cards
text:
this is very cute. Love the flash cards. The only issue I have with it, is the duck, is quite ugly and doesn't really look like a duck. They could have done better there.

Love the teether/handle. It is soft and won't damage teeth.

title: Ok quality but loads of fun.
text:
Fun toy. It was pretty easy to put together. It took about 45 minutes. The quality of the injection molded parts was low. The windows were warped and don't lay completely flat and we had to pop out the holes to push the windows into. The side, top of the seat doesn't have the holes for the screws to go into.

It's not the best quality for the price. There is only one speed and it goes kind of fast on the younger spectrum of the age recommendation.

It's a cute toy and my g'son loves it. For the price, quality just isn't what it should be. They need better Quality control for this product.

title: Fun and easy to assemble
text:
Fun toy and easy to assemble.

I love that it works 2 ways, as a ride on toy and as a rocking horse. Just push the buttons to remove and reposition the wheel section. Very easy.

The baby also made use of it as a walking toy by pushing it backwards.

The sounds made him dance and happy.

Recommended toy

title: ADORABLE and fun, not a soft plush toy.
text:
Fun toy. It is absolutely adorable. It makes such cute sounds...
Some of the sounds: belched, yawned, sneezed, whined, purred and it sounded like it said da-da. The movements do sound mechanical but they are cute movements.

It is a hard toy, not plush. I'm not sure how durable it would be for a 4 year old to carry it around, especially while it is in motion.

The roasting of the marshmallow is adorable but it makes the marshmallow look more like it has blood on it vs a toasted color.

My 22 year old daughter played with it for 20 minutes.

title: This is such an adorable toy. It is well made and loved
text:
This is such an adorable toy. It is well made and loved.

The reason for 3 stars is the price. If this set was mostly wood, it would be worth the high price. It is a good quality plastic but still plastic. It should be priced according to the materials not the name. In my opinion, BRIO used to rise above other toys because it was made of wood, which could be passed down to the next child.

title: Fun and the sound is clear.
text:
This is a fun toy.

the 8 month old loves it. It lights up and the sound is a decent volume. It's not blaring but loud enough for the baby to hear and enjoy.

The only complaint I have is the lion's mouth. It's not an easy task to open the mouth and put the balls in. It's not easy enough for a baby to do it. You have to pull open the mouth and there is no place in particular to grab it, making it difficult.

It rolls smoothly and is a great toy to hold on to while learning to walk. The things it does, identifying numbers you press and playing music is random. Sometimes it's music sometimes it's numbers.

title: He loved the music and likes to chew on the toys
text: This item is entertaining for the baby.  He is almost 6 months. His goal was to get to the "jam box" and chew on it.  He loved the music and likes to chew on the toys.  It's a little flimsy but it kept him on his tummy for longer than usual.

title: These say recommended for 24 months and up but on the box ...
text: These say recommended for 24 months and up but on the box it says for 3 yrs and up.  I guess I'll keep these as a gift for next year.

title: Who doesn't love Thomas the Tank Train
text:
Who doesn't love Thomas the Tank Train?!!?

We love this set. It's sturdy, and easy to assemble.

The train does get stuck in the bottom curve. We will do as suggested by someone else and add tracks to the bottom curve.

This is a very nice set and will add loads of fun to Thomas fans.

title: ... the box was smashed but contents were all in great shape. The rocks are great
text: The corner of the box was smashed but contents were all in great shape.  The rocks are great.  The supplies are mediocre.  Will update when we open the rest of the geodes.

title: Learning and Fun all in one.
text: I love this!  There is a small switch for parents to turn the toy on/off and there is also a big switch for baby to turn it on and off.  (The little switch has to be on for the big one to work).  It shows and says colors and shapes.  It's a great little toy!  Bright lights and music.  Learning and fun all wrapped in one.

title: It was so much fun for about 60 seconds
text: It was so much fun for about 60 seconds.  Then the fan stopped working.  We even changed the already new batteries to more new batteries.  I gently shook it around a bit and it made a rattling sound and started sounding like the fan was running again but it never did work again.  Too bad because we were really enjoying watching the color appear on the black paper.  If it would have continued working, it would be entertaining.

title: It's fun and the graphics are great
text: This game was played on the one player feature only.  It's fun and the graphics are great!  This is an awesome game for a 4-7 year old.  If your little one loves Frozen, this will light up their faces!

title: Fun toy for the baby.  They love the different sounds.
text:
Fun toy, the babies love it. I like the fun things the buttons make it say. On level one it names three basic shapes. Level 2 names the color of the 3 shapes and level 3 says different things. It also plays different music. The horn is always a hit! There is an on/off switch but don't think that you will get away with them not turning it back on. If you want quiet, you'll have to remove the batteries.
It's an easy to work switch, they will love playing the turn it off and on game.

The only think I don't care for, is they can't steer the bike. The wide front wheel does make it sturdier for the younger ages recommended.

title: Fun toy. We all love the little dancing guy
text: Fun toy.  We all love the little dancing guy.  My twin grand nephews love this thing.  The lights and music are exciting and catchy.  When he starts dancing, it's fun for everyone.  I can't wait to watch the babies grow with it.

title: Not good.  I don't recommend.
text:
so far so good. We didn't blow it up yet, we wanted to extend the length with some visqueen. The water slide allows for easy sliding and they continued the slide onto the visqueen. We plan to get more use out of it this coming weekend during a birthday party and I will update the durability of this item.

Update...blew it up and added water. The beginning is too high when it is blown up. You have to dive onto or over it then you hit the ground hard. Even worse, it ripped at the seam on the end after about 10 slides. The anchors are useless because they go after the blown up part. There were only 2 anchors included. It needed much more. The instructions are pretty useless.

title: Nice little 4-wheeler
text: Nice little 4-wheeler!  It took me about 45 minutes to put it together. I'm sure it would take you less time.  LOL!  The instructions were easy to follow.  I was surprised at the power this little thing has. Of course, you can choose not to connect the extra wire and make it go slower if you have a younger child.  As of now, it's great!

title: It's a heavy head doll, ok for playing
text: This doll isn't all that cute to look at.  It was fun for a little while for the girls.  The body is soft and cuddly but the head is heavy, kind of throws it off balance.  The clothes are not removable so there is no fun in changing her into a different outfit.  Price is average but not worth it for a doll that you can't do different things with.  Course, I guess the no changing of clothes is good for a travel doll.  No parts to lose.

title: Great for toddlers, not so for older children
text: Please keep in mind, this is for the younger ones! I had a  2 year old on it and he absolutely loved it. It was  good for indoor play, but don't confuse this with an actual gymnastics mat for the young gymnast. It is a tumbling mat which I actually think is perfect for the baby/toddler and young child!  For those reviews which are negative, I can see where if you gave this to a 5 year old boy as a gymnastics mat, you would be disappointed! Mine have even folded it to create a tent/tunnel.  I have had no problem at all with ripping seams or anything. I will update after more continued use!

title: Fun playset
text:
Nice sturdy little playset. Easy to set up and use. Baby Mozart in training, thinks it's great, only downside is the toys don't make any squeaky sounds. Recommended!

Adding: It would be nice if you could switch it to just the "piano keys" with each key playing a different note instead of continuing music.

title: Fun but it does make rude comments
text: This is a fun toy but it's not very encouraging for younger children with the comments that are made.  For older children and adults it can be a ton of laughing, passing it back and forth.  It seems to be very durable.

title: easy to work and mount
text: This soothing Peek a Boo Waterfall is the sweetest!  It has soothing sounds and a soft light.  Great for a newborn until baby can sit up or pull up to push the toucan their self. I love the colors and the monkey goes great with the rest of the rain forest baby bed set.

title: Nice appearance but opening is too big
text: The back of the elf ears that attach to your ears are way too big. I purchased these for my daughter, they don't fit her. I have pretty big ears and they don't stay on. The opening is just way too big, they fall right off.  You can use some kind of goo to keep them on but it would still be hard to keep them on.

title: Very well made
text: I got these for a gift and they are adorable!

title: Quiet, easy to use, and makes a great gift!
text:
We bought this as a gift for a friend of ours' daughter, and she absolutely loved it!

It took about 21 days for the tumbler to go through all of its stages, and the directions were really easy to follow even for a beginner.

The rocks came out really shiny and smooth as per my pictures.

I believe that this may have sparked a lifelong hobby for our friend's daughter!

title: Beautiful, but quality is lacking *Edited 2/1/20*
text:
The puzzle is beautiful, and the colors are vibrant. It adds a level of difficulty as the blacks on the mountain are almost completely indistinguishable.

My wife and I have had fun building this puzzle together, but the state in which a good portion of the pieces cake to us is disheartening.

A lot of the pieces have the backing peeling off, and it look like whatever machine cut these pieces out needs to be sharpened. It has left a good amount of the pieces with portions of the other pieces attached to them still.

I'm hoping that this is a fluke for my wife and my set, but that can't be verified by us alone.

*Edit - February 1st*

The puzzle creator sent my wife and I a replacement puzzle and an additional different puzzle as compensation. While the original puzzle was lacking in quality manufacturing, the customer service of the seller has gone above and beyond.

Thank you so much for trying to make this right.

I have changed my review to 4/5 for the quality customer service.

title: Fun for toddlers
text: These toys were perfect for my 18 month old! I know he'll use these for several years. Even the grown ups enjoyed playing with them! They're fun colors and great quality. Way better than a cheap pack we picked up at Harris Teeter!

title: Most Awesome Ducks Ever!
text: These ducks are sooo awesome they just sit there and look cool, and you can smack their helicopter helmets. What more could you possibly want from a rubber duck!

title: Great Activity
text: Great rainy day activity for the kids!

title: Great Gift
text: Fun game for kids, my niece loved it.

title: These stamps are super cute!
text: These are super cute and look exactly as advertised only downside is that for some strange reason the ink seems to be split into two colours down the middle and so the bigger stamps look weird if you use them normally the half and half colour doesn't help to show the image but just in general the stamps are really neat and I appreciate the variety as well.

title: Perfect!!!
text: Just as pictured and looks super cute! I honestly was very plesantly surprised with this one it looks exactly as shown it came in fast and the box is intact absolutely love it! Put it on my display with my other funkos right away.

title: Looks very good quality I love it!
text: I really like Miku's face here it looks perfect she's super kawaii, was very easy to assemble as well although the microphone part is very delicate be careful not to break it as you pass it through her tiny hands, other than that it looks great, the base is a lot bigger than I expected though so it does occupy a lot of space.

title: Exactly as you see it.
text: Looks very durable and cute! It is perfect for decoration I personally don't find it too appealing when it comes to how fluffy, if anything the material is a bit on the rough side but it looks exactly as described and very true to the character.

title: So squishy! Love the smell!
text: Squishiessss!!! Perfect gift! Perfect smell, I love these squishies I wish I could get all the squishies in the universe I love them so much ! This is a good addition also great scent! Still looking for the round bread one on amazon it is by far my favourite but this long one is a bit similar and the size is just perfect I like the sizing the bigger ones are just a bit too much for me but this size is just right big enough for a good squish but not so big that they bother me with space, also very soft!!! I just like this so much :) Please never change the price hahaha

title: They are different from the ones at the store
text: These are different from the ones I bought at the store not sure if they are literally different quality just because of that but it's quite literally the same brand so I am very confussed if they changed the quality or what happened, I am not angry or anything just saying I noticed they are different, I was trying to replace my old one and noticed that the material is a lot thinner for the new one I bought not only that but the smell is also very different, by that I mean that my old one obviously doesn't have any much more scent left anymore but you could still kind of get something from it, and even so the smell is quite literally a different one not the same (that is something I prefered before as compared to now it smells a lot more like actual bread/ makes me hungry too), the squishie itself is a lottt softer than the one I previously owned so that I am not sure if it's a plus or not I liked the consistency of it before but I guess it's cool that's its softer too for other people maybe? I like it harder because I can actually squish it harder without being afraid of accidentally breaking it, I guess for now I am just confused as to why I get a different product at the store when I buy the exact same brand, just completely different quality, did they change it?

title: So cute and fun to look at :)
text: So cute and perfect looks really fun and it's also fun to put together, you can also show the brain of the bear or leave the head on :)

title: Love it !
text: Perfect, I wish I could've gotten the crown moriarty as well for a better offer but this one was still good <3 I love him! Next best thing to crown moriarty.

title: Nice gun for the price. Im impressed.
text: This is well worth the money. I haven't gave it to my son yet its a Christmas present but I like it. It's pretty big for the price. I was pleasantly surprised.

title: Now my daughter doesn't cry for my remote she has her own now
text: This is my daughter's favorite new toy. I have an xbox that I use pretty much just for DVDs these days and she always wants my remote now she has her own.

title: If your wondering if you should buy it or not buy it.
text: This is a really nice costume. Its very realistic, my son loves it. He's 7 years old and the medium fits him . The pants are a little long.

title: Cute toy
text: This is a plastic toy. I thought it was cloth never the less its adorable and my daughter loves it!!

title: Adorable and nice for the price!!
text: She loves her baby shark phone!! Shes only 3 months old but shes fascinated with baby shark!! It looks just like the picture. The only bad thing I would say about it is it's not very loud but then again it might just need new batteries. I'll update when I buy new batteries for it.

title: Easy application, not much hold
text: I had a 1k piece puzzle to glue. At first I thought i could maybe get two full puzzles out of this bottle. But it didn't hold after the first application...or the second. The glue seems to foam a bit, almost lile soap, and is fairly runny so makes me think it's not super strong. I coated the front twice and the back once and I still think I need to just glue it to a board instead.

title: Good starter or intermediate :)
text: Few mods here and there due to mistakes on my part but absolutely great

title: Great for All ages!
text: My 13 year old received this as a reward gift! She loves it! We took close-ups of the inside of each geode. My husband helped with the larger geode. We all enjoy it!

title: Daughter loves!
text: Gift for my daughter. For all her hard work online in school and doing her chores! She loves it! Has a book describing each stone etc.

title: Cute!
text: Not only is this a cute piggy bank, it's also pretty durable. It's light weight (without coins, of course). It's a fun way to save your coins!

title: Nice Picture
text: I ordered this puzzle because it was a familiar brand. The pieces seem well cut out so far. There were a couple that were partially connected, but that wasn't problematic. There has been a lot of puzzle dust which doesn't really harm anything. I would have liked it to come with a poster to use as a reference. It makes it easier to hold one instead of the entire box lid. The picture is nice and vibrant.

title: Fun Mouse Ears
text: These are fun mouse ears. Overall the quality is pretty good. The band is fairly comfortable and fits both adult and children's heads. The ears are stuffed or padded which is better than a lot of the other ears available. These ears flop a little instead of staying upright which is the only negative thing about it. They don't continuously flop, just slightly during movement.

title: Nice Mouse Ears
text: These are nice mouse ears. According to the tag, it's an official Disney product thru Luv Her. I am not familiar with the Luv Her brand, but I can definitely attest that these ears seem to be official. The noticeable difference is the thickness of the ears. Ears from Disney are thicker/fatter than the cheaper ones. These ears fit me fine. There's no way I could wear them all day, but that's how I am with all headbands. I can't seem to wear them for more than an hour or so at a time before developing a headache. The quality is nice and they look cute, too!

title: Very Good Quality
text: When I was younger, I loved playing Memory! I am happy to have one that's more adult friendly than the one I had many years ago. The cards are sturdy. The images are beautiful. Memory is one of those games you can easily play by yourself or with others. I didn't even mention that it's a good brain exercise, too!

title: Funny!
text: My 24 year old son plays in a couple of different DND groups. He can't wait to take this to his next one. When I first showed this to him, it made him laugh out loud! He completely understood it while I really wasn't sure what it was for. He said his friends will think it's very funny, too. It's sturdy and feels durable. This would make a great gift or stocking stuffer!

title: A Beautiful Plush Animal
text: This is a beautiful plush animal. It's a good representation of what a wolf looks like. Pair this with a box about wolves and you have a great gift! It's an excellent quality!

title: Fun Addition to the Lego Succulents Set
text: This light kit is a fun addition to the Lego Succulents Set. It was a slight pain putting it on the completed Lego set. It wasn't that it was difficult, it was more that it was tricky to work in the small areas. The finished lights really make it stand out! I wish there was a better way to conceal the wires and parts.

title: Very Good Quality
text: My 24 year old son is a fan of League of Legends. I wasn't really sure what this was other than some kind of League of Legends collectible. The quality is much nicer than I anticipated. My son was very pleased with it. He has placed them on a shelf near his computer. This would make a great gift for any League of Legends fan!

title: Great Puzzle!
text: I am a fan of Springbok's puzzles. One thing that stands out in that the pieces are a little larger than most other puzzles. I find that to be a plus. When I'm finished, I take my puzzles to the nursing home where my father lives. There are a group of women there known as the "puzzle ladies".  They're in the 80's and enjoy puzzles, but they have difficulties with small pieces. This one is perfect for them. The image is fun and is getting me in the holiday spirit. The pieces seem to be well cut and there hasn't been much if any puzzle dust.

title: Does What it Says
text: I was recently on a road trip with my sister and her kids. I got this to entertain my 9 year old niece. Her older siblings have their type of smart watch, so I thought that this would be good for her. As far as looks go, it looks like other smart watches. My niece enjoyed taking pictures and videos on it. She spent some time playing some of the games. It did entertain her on the trip. However, I really don't think it will be something that will engage her regularly. I think she had fun with it because it was new.

title: Love This!
text: I love this puzzle advent calendar. I was a little skeptical at first, but upon seeing it in person and opening it up, I am a fan! The calendar has 24 little boxes. Each box contains puzzle pieces for a section of the whole puzzle. I opened box 1. I wasn't sure if the pieces were random or if they were continuous. The pieces were for a corner of the puzzle. If the pieces weren't for an entire section, I worried that it would be impossible to put together by only working on a few pieces each day. I've included a picture of what I was able to do after the first box. It comes with a huge poster so you can refer to it while working on it, but I didn't have to use it very much. Since there were only a few pieces to work with, it wasn't overwhelming or too difficult. I only did the 1st box. I am saving the rest of it so I can do this in December. The pieces are a little small, but they are a good quality. I didn't have any puzzle dust. There were no peeling pieces. I am excited to do the rest of this closer to the holidays!

title: So Many Options!
text: This baby gym by V-Tech has so many options for how to use it. It's colorful and very appealing. It has plenty to keep baby busy! There are plenty of colors, textures, sounds, and patterns to stimulate young minds. Batteries are included, but it is recommended that you replace them with fresh batteries.

title: Cute Collectible!
text: These Ted Lasso character Little People figures are a cute collectible. Some of the likenesses are better than others. I think Coach Beard, Ted, & Roy look closest to the original characters.

title: Wow!
text: I ordered this Lego train set, not sure who would want to build it. I have 2 kids in their early 20's - one in college, the other one who just started his first full time job. Then there's my husband and me, both in our mid 50's. It sat around for over a week without being touched. Then one Saturday night, my husband asked me if I would like to build it with him. I've never been much of a Lego builder. Both kids were and my husband was when he was a kid. I think my brother used to have some and I would build houses with them. Well, it took 2 nights to complete it, but we successfully built this train set. Wow! This is quite the Lego set! The instructions were easy to follow, as we expected with Lego. There were some extra pieces if needed. The train power source required a total of 10 AAA batteries.  My husband, who is a tech guy and loves all things nerdy/geeky really enjoyed playing with this train. It works really well. You can control and adjust the speed. We did learn that if you go at maximum speed, it jumps the track.  There are working headlights. It's really a cool set! We had a lot of fun with it. We're still having fun with it because it's still set up on the table.

title: Puzzle Mat
text: My daughter loves puzzles. However, she lives in a small place and doesn't have a space large enough to work on them. Her coffee table width is about 2 inches too small to complete average sized puzzles. This mat can easily be placed on her coffee table and provide her with a good work space. If she can't work on her puzzle for a few days, she can fold this up without losing her progress. The surface is soft and while it keeps pieces from moving around too much, it also doesn't allow you to move sections around easily. This is working very well for her. She's happy to be able to puzzle again!

title: As Described
text: My 24 year old son still collects Pokemon cards. He says that these are genuine Pokemon cards and that they are as described. He claimed the Ultra Rare card for himself and plans to give the rest to his younger cousins.

title: Great Size of Pieces
text: I love puzzles. This is something new for me that came out of the pandemic. This brand is one that I was familiar with. I really like the size of the pieces. They're not too small and they have a decent thickness to them. Plus there was minimal puzzle dust. I like the overall image, but I do want to note that there was no poster of the image included. That really makes it easier for me with my 50-year-old eyes. Plus if someone's helping me, one of us can use the poster and the other can use the box. Overall, it's a good puzzle.

title: Good Value
text: My 24 year old son still collects Pokemon cards. I showed him this set and let him look through the cards. He agreed that they were authentic Pokemon cards. He also felt that the description was accurate and that this was a good value for what you get. This would be good for someone who is starting their Pokemon collection.

title: Fun!
text: My daughter and her friends love the Hunt a Killer games. They were very excited to try this new one involving a jigsaw puzzle. The clues are realistic looking like they are in the other Hunt a Killer sets. The addition of the puzzle is new. The puzzle is a 1000 piece puzzle, so that took my daughter and her friends more than one evening to complete. They were a little concerned about the puzzle since you don't get a picture of the puzzle image, but it wasn't too difficult to do. It's a one time play game, but she always passes her games on to others to play. Overall, my daughter says this is a fun game, but for times sake, the traditional games work better for her over the ones with puzzles.

title: Cute Snake Pool Float
text: This is a cute snake pool float. We like it because it's different and not the typical float. It seems to be sturdy. I expect it to at least last through the pool season.

title: Excellent Kit!
text: I have been enjoying rock painting for the last few months. It's an activity that brings me joy. This is an excellent kit for those who are new to it or more experienced like me. The rocks in the kit are a great size for painting. The guide book not only gives lots of great ideas, but has step by step photo directions so you can easily replicate their designs and ideas. I really like using the transfer stickers. It gives a good outline that you can fill in with the paint. The googly eyes add some dimension, but I personally don't really care for the look. I happily recommend this kit!

title: Pool Fun!
text: I've been house sitting for my sister this past week. They have a nice in-ground pool which I used a lot during this hot week. This pool float is durable and held up to a week of heavy use. It's very cute - I like the floral design. The cupholder is small and only holds a regular water bottle or beverage can.

title: Great Doll!
text: My daughter loved American Girl dolls when she was younger. It has been a while since I had seen any of the newer dolls. I was unfamiliar with the Truly Me series. I think it's great that American Girl has these contemporary dolls that have changed with the times. This doll is well made. I love her blue hair! And the hair isn't just one color, it's got some streaks which make it look realistic. She comes with a book about Friends which is geared toward 3rd and 4th graders. She is a great addition to the American Girl family!

title: Thomas the Tank Engine
text: Great Thomas starter kit! This train set is perfect for someone just starting his or her Thomas the Tank Engine collection! It comes with a small amount of train tracks, a small building, one train car and of course, Thomas! It's sturdy and will last for years! This would make a great gift!

title: Fun Little Game
text: This is a fun little game. It's perfect for the cat lady in your life! The pieces are wooden and durable. The object of the game is to stack all of the cats onto the lady. I haven't been able to do it yet, but I have had fun trying!

title: As Described
text: This set of Pokemon cards is as described. I gave this to my 24 year old son who is still a big Pokemon fan. He said the description was accurate as far as the rare and foil cards. He actually found a couple that he felt was worth keeping. The rest he will share with his younger cousins who are ages 8-13. They will be thrilled!  He says this set is good for beginners.

title: Great Stickers!
text: These are great stickers! The quality is good. There were no inappropriate or offensive stickers in this pack.

title: Fun Assortment
text: My 24 year old son has been collecting Pokemon cards for years. This set of 20 "rare" cards, according to him, may technically be better than average cards, but they're fairly common. Out of the 20, he kept 2 for himself. The rest he will divide between his younger cousins. If you're new to collecting, these will probably be pretty good.

title: Good for Beginners
text: This set of Pokemon cards is good for beginners. You get a lot of cards for the price. The cards are from smaller packages and I'm assuming that they have been picked over before repackaging them. This set does include 10 hologram cards. For the most part the cards were pretty basic, but if you're just starting out as a collector, it's a good way to grow your collection.

title: Great Puzzle Set
text: The mother of my close friend has dementia. I go and hang out with her mother on occasion to give my friend a break. I recently took this puzzle set with me on a recent visit. The quality of the puzzle is really good. The pieces are sturdy. I think they are made from plastic foam board or something similar. They are also large sized and easy to grasp. The set includes some questions to ask while working on the puzzle. I found that some of the questions were a little too elementary, but most of them were fine. There was also a little paperback book with large colored bird pictures. My friend's mother enjoyed looking through the pictures. According to my friend, her mother had never been much of a puzzle person. She found this 24 piece puzzle to be difficult. I am wondering if a regular puzzler with dementia would have more success.  I don't fault the puzzle for her difficulties.

title: Fun Puzzle!
text: Being a beer lover, I thought this would be a fun puzzle to complete. I was right! I liked the subject matter and the illustration. The pieces were cut well. I didn't come across any peeling pieces. It does come with a poster for your reference which I appreciate. There wasn't much if any puzzle dust. I found that the tube container was a little difficult when it came to putting the pieces back into it when I was finished. This would make a great give for beer lovers!

title: Fun!
text: I ordered this remote control car for my 55 year old husband. He had one about 20 years ago when our kids were little and he loved playing with it out on the cul-de-sac. This one looks awesome. It's very contemporary looking. It goes pretty fast. The remote control is different from the old one that he had. He has found it to be okay, but it's a little more challenging to make turns than the older style one. It could just be a matter of needing more practice. It is a good quality and not just a child's toy.

title: Fun Craft Kit
text: I have been seeing Diamond Art Painting everywhere, but I have been hesitant to try it myself. I thought it would be difficult. I ordered this to give it a try before attempting a larger and more detailed set. I was a little confused at first, but I watched a good Youtube video that helped me a lot. I definitely think I can handle the larger ones. This is a fun craft kit and a good introduction to the world of diamond art painting.

title: Nice Size for Adults
text: This is a large pool float. It's a nice size for adults. The float is a mix of inflatable parts and mesh so you don't have to inflate the entire thing. The head rest/back rest is a little on the low side. It's designed more for fully reclining rather than sitting. There's a cup holder. Overall, it's a good addition for the pool!

title: Fun!
text: I help out a teacher friend of mine by watching her autistic son on the teacher work days when the teachers work but the students stay home. He's 19 and I have been watching him for years. I have spent many times watching Ice Age with him over the years. I ordered this to keep at my house for the times he comes over. I am excited for him to see it when he comes over next. Batteries are included! The acorn is magnetic. Scrat makes some noises and shakes. What's not to love!

title: Waiting for the Pool to Open!
text: This pool lounger is amazing! I can't wait for the pool to open. When I say "open", I mean warm up enough that I can get in the pool. I suppose this would be okay since it keeps you out of the water! It's easy to inflate and deflate, as far as pool inflatables go. I love the recline/lounge position. It's very comfortable.

title: Great Set!
text: This is a great set of Star Wars figures! They are from a variety of Star Wars movies & TV shows.  The figures are individually wrapped in tissue paper. Any accessories are loose in that wrapping. As I was opening them, some of the weapons would fall out and nearly got lost in the sofa cushions. I should have opened it at the table instead. In my family, I have a lot less Star Wars knowledge than my husband and son. Since the weapons were loose, I wasn't sure which ones went to which figures. It would have been nice if there had been a sheet with the figures and their accessories to go with this. Or if they had been printed on the box. The product description shows them all, but it would be helpful to have them all together.

title: Fun Travel Game
text: This is a fun travel game. It doesn't take up much space so he's easy to fit in a bag and take along with you. The game is easy to play once you've got a good understanding of the rules. It took us at least a round or two before we all finally got the hang of it. It works for 2 to 6 players. Overall, it's a fun game.

title: Educational
text: This is a cute and educational plush frog. My daughter is studying wildlife biology at college. I thought she might get a kick out of this new plush toy. And I was right, she loves it. The frog has a buttoned panel across his belly. When you unbutton it, you can see his internal organs. Each organ is attached with ribbon. The ribbon is labeled with the organ name. The organs open up and have some simple illustrations. It's mainly just line drawings. There are little fly drawings on the inside of the stomach. There are also fatty pieces which according to my daughter who recently dissected a frog, these look very accurate. Overall I think this is a great educational toy. It comes with a pamphlet of suggested activities.

title: Fun!
text: My daughter loves this type of "murder mystery" activity. It's an updated version of the classic "whodunnit". There are no scripts like the old style murder mystery. You're basically given a file of evidence to go through. The material is decent and most of the pieces look authentic which makes it more fun. You can't really do it more than once, but you could easily pass it along to a friend when you're finished. This can be done by yourself or with a few friends/family members.

title: Fun!
text: This is a fun Hot Wheels track set. The directions are clear and set up was straight forward. The recommended age seems correct. Younger players will probably need help putting it together. It would be fun for a parent/child to do together. One car is provided which is always nice but I'm sure the target audience already has a lot of cars!

title: Beautiful Pictures
text: I was drawn to this deck of cards because of the beautiful pictures. I was disappointed to find that the pictures are only on the face cards and the numbered cards are plain. The quality of the cards is decent. They're comparable to other basic cards. My daughter likes the set.

title: Fun
text: This is a fun track set for Hot Wheels. The recommended age of five and up is reasonable. Assembly required a little bit of grown up assistance. It does take a little effort to launch vehicles but it is fun to watch and play.

title: Soft Plushy
text: This kitty plush is very soft. It seems to be made well with no loose strings. The picture with the product description makes it look much larger than it is in person. The one I got is smaller than a soccer ball or close to it in size. At the price listed I could buy a larger name brand plushie.

title: Different
text: These stuffed animals are different and unique. They each have 2 sides/faces. It's easy to switch back and forth. They arrive compressed, but do expand rather quickly. They're smallish. They feel soft, but aren't super fluffy like the Squishmallows. The kids seem to like them.

title: Well......
text: I ordered this for my 24 year old son. I'm not sure if he or my husband was more excited. Because it's so big, it comes in parts and has to be assembled. That makes it less durable than one that was all one unit. It's definitely a unique shape. My son is into cosplay and thinks it will make a great base for a prop. He says he will probably add some additional supports to the barrel so it will be a little sturdier. The scope doesn't work well at all. My son has several Nerf guns. Most of them of just okay, but usable scopes. This one is less than okay and not usable. There's nowhere to store the darts. It's not super accurate, but it does work alright. The fire rate is very slow. So overall, it's okay. It's definitely a new and different shape. My son is actually really excited about working on this. If you're wanting this to battle with others, you should keep looking. If you're more of a collector, then you might enjoy this.

title: A Sweet Teddy Bear
text: This is a sweet Teddy Bear. He's soft and cuddly. His features are secure and well done. He will make someone very happy.

title: Really Soft!
text: This plush fox is really soft. It's also very cute. It's also very small. I didn't read the size in the description, so that's on me. There's only one picture of the item, so maybe an additional picture that shows a representation of its size would be helpful. Overall, it's very nicely made.

title: Cute Gnomes!
text: I like decorating for the different holidays. These gnomes are a great size for my tiered tray. They are well made with nice details. They are weighted on the bottom so they won't tip over too easily. I am very happy with them.

title: Nice Kit
text: I have been fascinated with these mini house kits. I have a few so far.This one is a nice kit. It comes with glue and tweezers in addition to all of the other supplies. The directions are clear enough. I've started working on this one. It does require me to use a special magnifying lamp because everything is so small and my near vision is horrible. So far, I am very pleased with how it's going.

title: Huggable!
text: This stuffed dino arrived compressed. Once it was opened, it didn't take too long for it to expand into its normal size. It's a soft and huggable stuffed animal. It's a decent quality. It did take almost exactly 2 months to arrive which I didn't know until after I ordered it. It did arrive a couple of days before estimated.

title: Educational
text: My 23 year old son collects rocks, minerals and crystals. I thought this would be a fun addition to his collection. It is nice seeing real samples of rocks and minerals displayed and labeled. It's an educational reference item for collectors. It is pretty small. The whole thing is smaller than an 8x10 picture. My son didn't have any difficulties reading the labels, but my eyes found it problematic. This would be great for a classroom.

title: Great Stickers
text: My daughter is in college studying wildlife biology. She loves nature and the outdoors. She was very happy to get these stickers. I would say that 95% of them are nature and outdoors related. There were a couple of odd ones such as a Disney's Haunted Mansion sticker and an ET one. We love Disney and the Haunted Mansion and ET is a fine, nostalgic movie. They just felt a little out of place. There may have been one or two more that we felt were in the wrong mix, too, but the majority of them are outdoors/nature themed. The sticker quality is good and comparable to other sticker sets. They seem to be printed pretty well.

title: Good Collectible
text: This League of Legends figurine is a good collectible. It looks a lot like the character. It's a nice quality. It stands up well. My son is a League of Legends fan and he is pleased with his new character.

title: Nice Set of Reference Cards for D&D
text: This is a nice set of reference cards dor D&D. My 23 year old son is the D&D player in our family, though many years ago, my husband was one. My son likes them and finds them helpful during game play. I would have to agree with the other reviewer about the small print, but my son is young and doesn't seem to mind. Illustrations are good.

title: Realistic Movements
text: I ordered this after seeing a video of a cat playing with a similar snake toy. My cats were entertained, but not enough to get up and attack it. The snake makes realistic movements which are fun to watch. There is a USB cable so you can charge it. It seems to get stuck easily. It also doesn't sense drop offs. Other than that, it's amusing.

title: Large Size
text: I've seen these bubble pop things all over the place, but I have never tried one before. I thought it might be a fun stocking stuffer for my kids. They are pretty large - at least larger than I expected. I was playing with one myself. I didn't find it as satisfying as I thought I would.  Several of the bubbles came undone or unpopped and I had to go back and repop them. They seem fine. The shapes were fun. Will have to wait and see if the kids (both in college) like them.

title: Wonderful Barbie Doll
text: I love that there have been some great black Barbie dolls lately. This is my second Brooklyn doll and she's awesome! I especially like that it's not just a black version of Barbie. Brooklyn's hair is braided and she has edging near her forehead. With details like that, she stands out from the traditional Barbie. She comes with lots of camping/hiking accessories and a puppy! She will bring happiness to a young girl!

title: Brings Back Memories!
text: This game sure brings back memories. I love that the game has the original box design! The game play is just like I remembered. I let my nieces and nephew play with it and they really enjoyed it. It does help with deduction and reasoning skills.

title: Fun Advent Calendar
text: I was a little surprised with some of the negative reviews. If you don't regularly buy rocks and minerals, I can see that you might be disappointed, but my 23 year old son buys and collects them and they are often very small pieces. If you want larger ones, it's going to cost a pretty penny! Now, until I opened it, I was a little worried. There was a lot of noise when I shook it. I was afraid everything would be broken and crumbly or that items had gotten mixed up inside.  I was very pleasantly surprised. Everything was in tact and looked great. I got this calendar for my son that I mentioned above. I always get my kids a fun advent countdown calender. I was able to open it from the top and slide the tray out without damaging the perforated doors/windows (or whatever you call the openings). The tray was divided and everything was in its place and looked great. I do not know a lot about rocks and minerals, but from my novice point of view, they are nice. Some are raw, others are polished. There are fossils in addition to the rocks and minerals. The first thing you open is a little magnifying glass and cloth. My son uses a jewelry loupe to examine his collection, but for a new collector, I'm sure what is provided will be useful. The quality of the items seems to be good and comparable to some of the ones that I have purchased for my son in the past.  In order to get the large, cool ones, you have to spend a lot of money! This is actually impressive to receive such a variety of items at this cost. I think my son will have fun opening it.

title: Soft!
text: This plush octopus is unique and interesting. I haven't seen many plush octopuses during my life. This one is cute and soft. He arrived compressed and squished, but once the package was opened, he filled out. There is a small loop/string on the top of his head. I am guessing that is so you can hang him up.

title: Soft Kitty!
text: This is definitely what I would call a gimmicky toy, but in all fairness, it's a sweet toy. The plush kitty is very soft. The details are embroidered which is always good for younger children. Batteries are required (not included). There's an instruction booklet which tells you how to change the colors and other features. I haven't seen this on TV - I must not be watching the right shows!

title: Plush Sloth
text: This plush sloth is definitely cute. He's not very fluffy, but he is soft. Quality is better than what you might win at the carnival. Eyes and nose are plastic. They seem to be secure. He's bound to bring a smile to his new owner!

title: Disney Princesses
text: These little Disney Princess dolls are basically Polly Pockets. They will provide lots of fun for your little princess and some grief to Mom & Dad! I say that with humor (and a little bit of seriousness) because my 20 year old daughter went through the Polly Pocket phase and the small pieces often got lost. And then found years later! There are 12 different Disney Princesses and they all come with 2 outfits. The dolls are wearing one outfit and then there's a separate outfit for the Royal Ball. The dolls are all individually wrapped in tissue paper, as are the spare outfits. I've included a picture. Also, the box is pretty boring and doesn't have any full color photos of what you're getting. So if you're not familiar with this toy set, then you won't know what you have until they're all opened. That could be fun or it could be annoying. Since they're all individually wrapped, it would be great to use for homemade Advent calendars or or party favors.

title: Very Soft
text: This guy arrived in a semi-compressed bag. I think the bag may have leaked air because it wasn't fully compressed like some. So when I opened the bag, he remained flat. All it took was some squeezing and fluffing and he quickly filled out. I would say he is pretty similar to the popular Squishmallows. He's very soft and squeezable. As a pillow, he's a good size. My 20 year old daughter has several Squishmallows and often uses them as a pillow. He seems to be made well as far as I can tell.

title: Panda Plush
text: This plush panda toy is soft. It comes compressed down, but it expands to its regular size in a relatively short amount of time. It's very huggable. It has no strong chemical odor.

title: Comes with 3 Mini Figs
text: This Lego set is not just a building set. It is interactive, too. It has a vehicle that shoots things. The instructions are easy to follow and understand. It comes with 3 mini figs which is nice. Lego is usually good about that. I've gotten other brand play sets that come with just one figure and that makes for less enjoyable playtime. This Lego set is a tie-in to the Monkie Kid show but it is still fun for those who aren't familiar with it.

title: Beautiful Doll
text: This Wellie Wisher Kendall doll is beautiful. The Wellie Wisher dolls are smaller than the original American Girl dolls and geared toward a slightly younger audience. Though a separate product line, they do share some of the American Girl traits. For example, the painted teeth look very similar. This doll is a excellent quality and is what I would expect from the American Girl brand. She would make a wonderful gift!

title: Smaller Than American Girl Dolls
text: The Wellie Wisher dolls are related to the American Girl Dolls. They're smaller than the AG Dolls and geared toward a younger audience. The dolls have the same quality that the larger AG dolls have. The doll doesn't come with much more than just her outfit. She is sturdy as far as dolls go. Supposedly there are books based on these new dolls, too.

title: Large Playset
text: This Spidey playset is pretty big. It was larger than I expected. It was easy to put together. Only 1 figure & vehicle is included, so if you really want to play out the cartoon, you need to buy more. It comes installed with batteries, which is nice. The volume on the toy is loud and I don't see any way to control it. It's a sturdy playset. The recommended age seems appropriate.

title: Fun Lego Set
text: This is a fun Lego set! The jet looks really cool when it's assembled. Lego is pretty good about clear instructions to follow. This was no exception. The recommended age is appropriate, though a slightly younger builder might do fine with a little guidance. There are 4 mini-figs included. I think this would be fun for Lego fans, regardless of the Monkie Kid tie-in.

title: Absolutely Adorable!
text: I ordered this for my daughter. It is absolutely adorable! It's made well, too. It comes with a little adhesive sticker to attach to the dashboard. There are also felt discs that you can add Essential Oils or perfume to so it works as an air freshener. My daughter is very excited to have this in her car!

title: Cute Doll
text: I was unfamiliar with the Wellie Wisher dolls by American Girl until recently when I saw them at Costco. I came home and looked them up online. These dolls are about 4 inches shorter than the traditional American Girl dolls. The target audience is a little younger than the AG audience. I think it's a nice transition between baby dolls and the American Girl doll line. Evidently there are books that go along with the Wellie Wisher dolls, but it's not included. Here you basically get the doll and her outfit which includes the Wellie boots, hence the name of the collection. Ashlyn looks like she could be Hispanic or Latin American. Regardless, I am pleased to see some diversity in the collection. She's really cute and seems to be well made. This model is a newer one. It looks like the original Wellie Wisher dolls had issues with their legs coming off. I really hope that they fixed that issue with this new release.

title: Fun Skate Park!
text: This Tech Deck skate park is easy to set up. I did watch the video on the product description which I found to be helpful. The finished park is a good size. It's not too big, but it's big enough to do tricks and such. It comes with 1 skateboard. The assembled set is pretty sturdy.

title: Love the Larger Pieces!
text: I never really enjoyed puzzles until we started staying home more because of the pandemic. I've done several since then. I love the larger pieces that are in this one. It definitely makes it easier on these 50+ year old eyes! There was no puzzle dust. The pieces were cut well. I think there was one that had some excess cardboard on it, but that's it. I usually do 1000 piece puzzles that take at least a week for me to complete, but there's something to be said about the 300 piece ones. I started last night and did the border, then during the day today I finished the rest. All pieces were present and accounted for. I enjoyed the folk art style image.

title: Great Details
text: This is a realistic looking plush dog. The details, especially the face, are great! The body is firm and not squishy like some plush animals. Though I do believe he (or she) can stilled be hugged adequately. I do think it's a bit pricey, but it is a good quality.

title: Educational
text: It's always nice to find an educational toy for your child that's fun and themed after one of their favorite TV shows! This Paw Patrol Learning Tablet comes ready to play. Batteries are installed, but it is recommended that you replace those since they were geared toward demo purposes rather than actual play time. There are a variety of games (math, pre-reading skills, etc) that are engaging and fun. I would agree with the age range of 3-6 years old.

title: Soft
text: This plush Koala is very soft. He's not stuffed very fully which makes him very huggable. The quality is okay, but he doesn't seem like a high end plush. With that being stated, he's definitely a little better than what you would win at a carnival game. His eyes seem to be attached securely. I don't see any noticeable flaws.

title: Non-Slip
text: I have been using a large, wooden puzzle board with trays for the pieces. When I saw this, I was intrigued with the ability to tightly close it up without destroying the work in progress. The wooden one will keep the puzzle safe, but you have to find a large place to set it when you're not working on it. So I started a 500 piece puzzle on this board. It's got a fuzzy surface which makes it non-slip. That is good at times, but there are times when I will work on a section of a puzzle and slide it to it's destination. That's difficult to do with this one. Instead of puzzle trays, it has flat fuzzy pieces that you can put the pieces on and move around as needed. With my 500 piece puzzle, I couldn't get all of the pieces spread out flat on the combined boards. I had to have some stacked on top of one another. After I had completed the border, I decided to stop for the evening. I put the puzzle boards on top of the main puzzle area where my work was. Then I closed everything up and made sure the velcro pieces were secure. Then I tilted the whole unit at a 90 degree angle. I heard pieces moving around. My heart sank. The border is always a lot of work! I opened it back up and while the pieces had moved around, it was only the pieces that hadn't been assembled yet. The work area with my completed border was still in tact. I think I will feel better leaving this on a flat surface, such as a table when it's not in use. It does keep the cats from sitting on my work and that's a plus. I always had to cover my work with a towel or something with the wooden tray. This is also weighs less than the wooden one which makes it easier to move. Overall, I am pleased with this puzzle storage piece.

title: Top Quality!
text: This cat themed puzzle by Two Birds Press is top quality! It's got a lot of pink and a lot of cats - 2 of my favorite things! The pieces are cut well. I didn't notice any pieces stuck together. There were no peeling pieces. There was minimal puzzle dust. The only thing that would make this puzzle better would be to include a pullout poster of the image. I find it easier to work with those than the box lid. Other than that, I have no complaints!

title: Compatible with Hot Wheels
text: This garage set will make a very happy kid! It's amazing! There's hours of fun ahead for the recipient of this toy. It comes with some die cast vehicles, but it's also compatible with Hot Wheels cars, too. Set up was not too bad. Batteries are needed for lights and sounds. The set is sturdy and seems to be a very good quality.

title: Super Soft Shark!
text: This plush shark is awesome! It's super soft! He's also very squishy. In fact, it reminds me a lot of Squishmallows! His eyes aren't plastic pieces sewn on, instead they are embroidered which makes it safer for young children. I totally recommend this plush!

title: Good Quality
text: This plush tiger is a good quality. It's much nicer than what you would win from a claw machine or a carnival game. He's wearing a t-shirt and comes with a blank birth certificate to formalize the adoption. Overall, he's a cute little guy!

title: Such Fun!
text: I have other Sticker & Chill books. They're so much fun! I love the retro theme of this one. It's basically Colorforms for grownups. This is a great activity to decompress after a stressful day.

title: Cute Kitty
text: This plush kitty is cute. She (or he) arrived compressed. Once the bag was opened, it started to expand to normal size. It's soft and furry. The kitty is very huggable.

title: Great Game!
text:
Updated 10/17: See below for update.

My family has been a fan of Settlers of Catan for years. My college kids were excited to give this 3D version a try. Unfortunately, more than half of the pieces were missing. It would be an understatement to say we were disappointed. Especially since we were teased by the few pieces that we did receive. I contacted the customer support for the Catan game. They said they couldn't help me and directed me to the manufacturer. I contacted the manufacturer. They said they couldn't help me either. Our game came with the 19 painted terrain hexes, 6 painted sea frames and 9 painted harbor pieces (I think). We received no cards, no instructions, no dice, no rules booklet, no tokens, no settlements, no roads and possibly more. What we have is unplayable and unusable. And a disappointed family!

Update: 10/17: After I posted my original review, I was contacted by the makers of Catan. They apologized for the poor customer service that was given. They also sent me a replacement game for which my family is very appreciative. The game has arrived in its entirety. The game play with the 3D pieces is awesome! It really adds a whole new element to the game. It does take a lot of room to play, more so than the original, but it's really fun to see and feel the pieces. I think it creates a more immersive experience. My 23 year old son has scheduled an upcoming game night with his friends to play this version of the beloved game.

title: Very Soft and Huggable!
text: This Teddy Bear is very soft and huggable. He's a little on the thin size - maybe he needs some more honey! His eyes and nose are attached securely. The rear paws have embroidered pads. He has a satin ribbon around his neck which is a bit wrinkly. His eyes are mostly hidden by fur and eyebrows. I'm hoping that they'll eventually spread out. He would make a good gift.

title: Cute!
text: This is a cute Disney Toy Story play set. It's from Pizza Planet and has the claw machine. It comes with a Buzz Lightyear and an alien figures, though they are small. The doors to Pizza Planet can be opened by turning the Power Pad. The alien can be picked up by the claw by a Power Pad, too. The claw doesn't work as well as a real claw machine and does require assistance. But you can simulate the scene from the movie. For children who are good with imaginative play, this can be a fun toy.

title: Basic
text: This PJ Transporter & Cat Car set is pretty basic. It's a good sized truck with one figure/car. They don't  really do anything. It's almost too simple. Yes, kids can use their imagination, etc, but you've got to give them more to work with. Include more than one character/car or have sound effects. The quality of the pieces are decent. It just lacks the wow factor.

title: Giant Sorry
text: We have quite the collection of giant outdoor games. They're a lot of fun when we host cookouts. The game of Sorry was a childhood favorite! The game board is a little more durable than the a disposable table cloth, but not as durable as the vinyl table cloths backed in felt. The pieces have to be put together, but then once assembled, they don't fit in the storage box. The game uses a spinner instead of dice. The large definitely has an appeal to it. There is room for improvement with this one.

title: Easy to Set Up
text: This Paw Patrol True Metal play set is based on the Paw Patrol movie and allows you to reenact various scenes from the movie. It was easy to set up. The sturdy pieces are numbered to help you get them in the right order. We added the stickers before we assembled it which I think was a good idea. I think we might have ended up with crooked placements in we waited to apply them after it was all put together. The set only comes with one vehicle, but supposedly other Paw Patrol vehicles will work with it. The recommended age is 3 and up which I think is appropriate.

title: Grave Digger
text: The building of the truck was good. Playing with the truck, meh. The quality of the pieces is pretty good. Building it is a little complicated for younger builders, but with assistance, it's easy enough. The truck comes with stickers so it really does look like Grave Digger when you're done. Once you're finished putting it together, the pull back motion didn't seem to work that well. Of course you could manually move it, but that's not fun. Overall, it's just okay.

title: What a Cutie!
text: What a cutie! This dinosaur is absolutely adorable! He's a good quality plush toy.  He's super soft. His details are well done. I am very impressed with him. He is so much nicer than what you would get at the carnival or from a claw machine.

title: Fun!
text: V-Tech toys have always been a favorite of mine. They do a great job of creating fun and imaginative toys for kids. This one is a Mickey Mouse food truck themed play set. It comes with batteries for demo purposes, and recommends fresh ones before you start playing with it. This set comes with Mickey, but it's designed to work with other similar character sets. They have what they call "smart points" which are areas that trigger sounds from Mickey's food truck. There's some assembly required, including the positioning of some stickers. The targeted age group is 1-5 years which seems appropriate.

title: So Cute!
text: I love Fisher Price Little People! I was excited to see a Frozen play set. Rather than being in a colorful, printed box with photos of what the item looks like, it was in a plain kraft one. It did say "Fisher Price Little People Frozen" on the box, but I didn't realize that it was the actual one. When I opened that, the pieces and parts are in clear plastic bags.
